message.body: I don't think I could go away with Jeff for a weekend
And like the Jordan that hangs out with him is also so weird
Yeah. It's hard to try to predict which Jordan will be prominent in any given situation
That's so true. But Jeff Jordan is like the Jordan that we used to dislike but more prominent
I feel like we'd have to intervene in that situation. Or you me and Julia camp out in The next town
Lmfao omg I didn't know you used to not like Jordan
I've known him since I was a freshman. I didnt totally hate him or really know him that well but what i did know I did not like.
He always invited me to weird events on Facebook and his musical personality... Idk I just disliked him
Yeah! I was like stop. Rude. And while you're at it cut your hair. Cus it's bad.
Yeah I know, that's exactly how it was with me. He was kinda annoying and condescending about artsy shit
Yeahhhh omg his hair. I went through my long hair phase in middle school so I was just like "ugh grow up"
It looked SO bad. Exactly. And it was also like he thought he was so cool and I was like no you're a loser. So there were some communication issues
Yeah, and I think fundamentally the issues I still have with him now are rooted in my old animosity towards him. We have a lot in common but he has different values than me and it annoys me sometimes
Yeah I see that. But you guys are able to appreciate that and you like each other a lot despite it. When you guys are working really well together it's a beautiful thing
Yeah I know. I love it. The problem is that it's hard to know when it will be good and when we will be at each others throats
Jw when do you leave for Atlanta?
I'm not exactly sure. Move in day is August 25th but idk how soon before then I will actually be leaving NYC
